title: r/Prorevenge Scam Me? I'll Trick You Out of $1,500,000!
description:
r/Prorevenge What happens when a company tries to scam a business owner out of paying for a very expensive machine? Well, that business owner enacts a little bit of pro revenge and holds deactivates the machine that the scammer's entire business relies on. Pay us the $1.5 million, or you'll go out of business! If you like this video, subscribe to my channel for more daily Reddit content!
